name: bed
look_description: Although this bed was clearly in the middle of having its sheets changed, it's still horrible. The bedframe is oddly understated and the lack of bedding gives the room a hollow and unlived in feeling. You imagine that sitting on the bed would give a perfect view of the gaudy painting on the opposite wall.

touch.text: The bed is firm and the matress feels rough with no sheets.

use.text: You climb on the bed and stare listlessly at the ceiling for a moment, before climbing out.
